system.effect: The target's head bursts like an overripe fruit and sprays blood, bone, and brains in all directions. Each target within 4 metres of the deceased must make a Challenging (+0) Agility test or suffer a -10 penalty to his Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill tests on his next turn, as gore gets in his eyes or obscures his visor.

description.value:
Impact Damage to Head (Severity 9)

The target's head bursts like an overripe fruit and sprays blood, bone, and brains in all directions. Each target within 4 metres of the deceased must make a Challenging (+0) Agility test or suffer a -10 penalty to his Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill tests on his next turn, as gore gets in his eyes or obscures his visor.
